parameters.name: BaseEntity
parameters.description: IEntity of another edge or face to get distance from this entity (see Remarks )

parameters.name: MinDistance
parameters.description: True to return minimum distance; false to return maximum distance

parameters.name: Parameter
parameters.description: For in-process, unmanaged C++: If MinDistance = False, and BaseEntity is an edge or curve, specify an array of two doubles (Min, Max), where Min and Max make up the U-parameter range of BaseEntity and BaseEntity is a face, specify an array of four doubles (UMin, VMin, UMax, VMax), where UMin, VMin, UMax, and VMax make up the UV-parameter range of the surface of BaseEntity If MinDistance = True, and BaseEntity is an edge or curve, optionally specify an array of two doubles (Min, Max), where Min and Max make up the U-parameter range of BaseEntity and BaseEntity is a face, optionally specify an array of four doubles (UMin, VMin, UMax, VMax), where UMin, VMin, UMax, and VMax make up the UV-parameter range of the surface of BaseEntity For VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: Position1
parameters.description: For in-process, unmanaged C++: pointer to an array of doubles (coordinates of this entity that were used to measure the distance) For VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: Position2
parameters.description: For in-process, unmanaged C++: pointer to an array of doubles (coordinates of BaseEntity that were used to measure the distance) For VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Minimum or maximum distance between entities; if Parameter is not specified, the minimum distance

title: IEntity.IGetDistance
description: Gets the minimum or maximum distance between this entity and the given face or edge entity (see Remarks).
signature:
System.Int32 IGetDistance( 
   Entity
BaseEntity
,
   System.Boolean
MinDistance
,
   ref System.Double
Parameter
,
   out System.Double
Position1
,
   out System.Double
Position2
,
   out System.Double
Distance
)

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Minimum or maximum distance between entities; if Parameter is not specified, the minimum distance

remarks:
Only face and edge entities are supported.
To populate Parameter you can find the UV parameter ranges as follows:
For edges and curves, use
IEdge::GetCurveParams2
For faces, use
IFace2::GetUVBounds
